text:
Hi there. It's Jennifer from English with
Jennifer.

I'm so happy you're interested in
becoming a member of my channel.

Memberships allow you to get the very
most I can offer here on YouTube.

Basic members pay $0.99 a month
and get loyalty badges next to their

names that will appear in the comments
on my channel and in live chats.
Basic members also get use of custom emojis during live chats on my channel.
Finally, members get access to practice tasks on the community tab twice a week.
If you choose to become a Super Member for $4.99 a month, you'll get access to all

the perks I just mentioned plus a couple
more. Super Members also get access to

a member only live stream. This is a
30-minute lesson with interactive tasks

and the chance to ask questions through
the live chat. I also thank my Super Members

with on-screen credit in one of
my videos once a month.
Do you want to feel truly marvelous when you study English? A Truly Marvelous Member of my channel

gets all the perks mentioned so
far and one more. It's a big one!
A Truly Marvelous Member of my channel receives a 15-minute Skype call each month

for language practice. This is a chance to
have a short conversation and ask any
questions you may have about the English language or American culture.
If YouTube memberships aren't available in your country, remember that you still have

access to all my YouTube videos. I'm not
taking anything away.
As always, thanks for watching, and wherever you are, I wish you happy studies!
